sentence.Network_en: The Inquisition of the Medieval Ages devised many demoniac means of torture.
sentence.Network_cn: 中世纪的宗教法庭创造了许多骇人听闻的酷刑.

sentence.Network_en: This is the apartman, the demoniac dreamer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个离群索居的人, 被魔鬼迷住的梦想者.

sentence.Network_en: This is the apart man, the demoniac dreamer - Dr Heidegger - doomed for his arrogant isolation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里一个离群索居的人, 被魔鬼迷信的梦想者,象海德格医生那样,命里注定要过妄自尊大的孤独生活.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French demoniaque, from ecclesiastical Latin daemoniacus, from daemonium 'lesser or evil spirit' (see demon)

encyclopedia.content: Dmoniac 3D Demoniac一词源于英文，意为魔鬼的；凶恶的或者魔鬼附身的人；凶暴。 同名短片Dmoniac是一部在面向女同群体的3D短片。故事内涵并不丰富且包含一些成人元素。目前在网上各种视频平台流传。 Demoniac系列目前为止只找到一部，类似的东西恕在阅历较浅，从来没有发现过。同类3D作品大都属于粗制滥造，没见过如此精良之作，即使是行业大牌ILLUSION公司的CG动画也未必都有如此的质量。 制作该视频的公司名字叫Digital Graffi

means.word_mean: 1. someone who acts as if possessed by a demon
1. in a murderous frenzy as if possessed by a demon;
2. resembling or suggesting possession by a demon;

auth_sentence.content: The Gadarene Demoniac was infested with legions of these entities when Jesus cast them out of him into a swine herd.
